law.catch_line: At any meeting of the members of a savings and loan association:...
law.text:
At any meeting of the members of a savings and loan association:
Except as provided in the charter or bylaws, any number of members present in person or by proxy is a quorum; and
Unless otherwise specifically provided by law, the charter, or the bylaws, a majority of all votes cast at which a quorum is present determines any question.
